description:
exp/html: adjust inSelectIM to match spec

Simplify the flow of control.

Handle EOF, null bytes, <html>, <input>, <keygen>, <textarea>, <script>.

Pass 5 more tests.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, nigeltao@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 22 May 2012 14:17,  <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> R=nigeltao

Andy, when you "hg mail", please send the review directly to me:
hg mail -r nigeltao -cc golang-dev@googlegroups.com 123456

Or just set the reviewer to "nigeltao" when you "hg change".
golang-dev should be CC'ed automatically.

On Tue, May 22, 2012 at 1:23 AM, Nigel Tao <nigeltao@golang.org> wrote:
> Andy, when you "hg mail", please send the review directly to me:
> hg mail -r nigeltao -cc golang-dev@googlegroups.com 123456

hg mail -r nigeltao 123456
is all you need

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=da5b554f6ea6 ***

exp/html: adjust inSelectIM to match spec

Simplify the flow of control.

Handle EOF, null bytes, <html>, <input>, <keygen>, <textarea>, <script>.

Pass 5 more tests.

R=golang-dev, rsc, nigeltao
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6220062

Committer: Nigel Tao <nigeltao@golang.org>

subject: code review 6220062: exp/html: adjust inSelectIM to match spec
